channel.title: Comments on: Resilience and Happiness
channel.description: Strategies to recover from stress quickly

item.title: By: Cheryl
item.dc:creator: Cheryl
item.description:
I think resilience and happiness are two separate entities. Resilience is survival under any circumstance and having the skills & ability to do that well and with a positive outcome.
I think happiness is a state of mind based on a person's view of their life and relationships (relationship to others and to the world/universe). Happiness can also be based on the outcomes of what resilience has brought to your life. However, some people are happy with living in chaos and never escaping a life situation others would consider a failure.
